author: Bloomberg News
title: Dow set to jump 600 points at open on report that Gilead drug is helping COVID-19 patients
description: The week is ending on an upbeat note after the White House set guidelines to reopen the economy
content: U.S. equity futures bounded higher with stocks in Europe and Asia on Friday as tentative steps toward restarting the world’s largest economy helped investors look past mixed progress on curbing the coronavirus and dismal data from China. Oil futures slumped i… [+1740 chars]
